name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Quality Enhancer Extension: ClipMage AI

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI Powered Video Quality Enhancement for all videos in chrome.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Video Quality Enhancer Extension: ClipMage AI

ClipMage AI is an AI Powered video quality enhancer for all your videos in chrome. No more blurry, unfocused videos. ClipMage lets you upscale and enhance videos up to High Definition quality right in your browser.

It also features other tools like a ChatGPT sidebar to chat with AI models to 10x your productivity, as well as AI Image and Video Generation. 

An All-in-one AI tool for your browser.
